name: Angry Waifu
description:
Angry Waifu is a crazy action RPG game with various possibilities and cutest anime girls!

Take an adorable waifu girl under your control and crush your enemies in a bloody battle! Protect an ancient mansion and it's secrets from the anime girls invasion. Use your deadly katana to chop anime girls to pieces and steal their underwear!

Features:
  • Adult hentai content
  • Crazy slasher gameplay
  • Perks and upgrades
  • Amazing Japanese voiceover for screams and moans
  • Large detailed mansion to explore
  • Collectables and Steam achievements
  • Insane graphics and music

Angry Waifu is definitely the crazies game you have ever played. So what are you waiting for? Release your deepest and the most perverted fantasies! Try it now!
